::DrillBit::

He still waited for a reply about Dark Mouse, so he dicided to go see
her and Dollen. He got up and walked to the mess hall. When he arrived
he sat with them.
"I sent a comm message but I havn't gotten a reply."
He opens a comm to Killfest.
"We have a group of bots outside the volcano. They want Dark Mouse. We
may have to enter combat. Stand by."

::Dollen::

"What do they want with you, Dark Mouse?"

::Demolition::

Demolition transformed to jet mode, and took off for Alliance island.
He needed repairs.
